message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be a valuable asset to your business.  My initial price is $1,000,000.  I'm confident that we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I value your interest, $950,000 is unfortunately below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down to $975,000, reflecting the significant value this product brings.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I'm still within my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $960,000 for the product. This seems to be a fair compromise between our positions.
